name: NYDailyNews
text:
Thousands gathered Sunday throughout NYC in the fourth day of protests over the death of George Floyd, with the NYPD and businesses braced for violence and looting.

After two nights of violence, the protests began peacefully. 

https://t.co/gebIQmggzt

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: SEE IT: Peaceful demonstrators barred violent looters from breaking into a Brooklyn Target during chaotic protests over the death of George Floyd.
https://t.co/fGpdu5slxI

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The American Civil Liberties Union is encouraging people participating in protests to download an app that documents police interactions.

The app was designed to document potential police misconduct in case situations cannot be de-escalated.

https://t.co/PYn1TZ4zt0

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Michael Jordan spoke out against the “ingrained racism and violence towards people of color,” joining countless others reeling from the death of George Floyd

“I am deeply saddened, truly pained and plain angry."

https://t.co/jAoJbycf3S
